name: HarryPotterDates
0:
”Alexa, open Harry Potter Dates”
”Alexa, start Harry Potter Dates”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: harry potter dates
des:
Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming events in the Harry Potter world (important dates and birthdays). 
Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific event.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
